original_text: The Israelites continued to serve the Lord while Joshua and the old men were still alive. Joshua and those men had seen the great things that the Lord had done to help Israel.
korean_text: 백성이 여호수아가 사는 날 동안과 여호수아 뒤에 생존한 장로들 곧 여호와께서 이스라엘을 위하여 행하신 모든 큰 일을 본 자들이 사는 날 동안에 여호와를 섬겼더라

sentences.original_text: The Israelites continued to serve the Lord
while Joshua and the old men were still alive
Joshua and those men had seen
the great things that the Lord had done
